content: Mark, great to see you covering this topic given the current politics of the Repub. party nominee. I’m frightened in ways I’ve never experienced. Anyway, just want to make sure your portfolio company is aware of or working with the people at FWD.US (initiative started by Zuckerberg) who are committed to the concerns of immigration reform. They are also working with Venice based start up Sensay helping to grow their community on this topic. Love your blogging. Brian
